description: Usopp's 5-ton hammer was actually papier-mâché, and the two special agents counterattack, but Chopper finds their weak spot and fires Lassou's bullets into the molehill, causing a gigantic explosion.
The explosion wasn't enough to defeat Mr 4 and Miss Merrychristmas, but after a new strategy from Usopp and Chopper, they manage to defeat them once and for all.

title: A close fight
description: As Vivi arrives at the palace and asks Chaka to destroy it, Sanji and Mr 2 continue their battle with the latter, who takes on the appearance of the cook's companions.

title: The ballet coup
description: While Chaka accepts Vivi's request, Mr 2 gets the better of Sanji after transforming into Nami, but the latter finally understands the transvestite-fruit's weakness.
Sanji finally defeats Mr 2 after discovering his weakness. While Crocodile arrives at Alubarna's palace and prevents its destruction, Nami is pursued by Mr 1 and Miss Doublefinger.

title: The climate stick
description: After being saved in extremis by Zoro, who begins to fight Mr 1, Nami is confronted by Miss Doublefinger and tries to use Usopp's climatic stick.

title: The woman who controlled time
description: Nami tries to learn how to use the climatic stick while escaping Miss Doublefinger's attacks.

title: Storm warning
description: At Alubarna Palace, Crocodile asks Cobra for the location of Pluto, while Nami continues to battle Miss Doublefinger after understanding the techniques of the climatic stick.

title: Utopia
description: Nami finally defeats Miss Doublefinger with the most fearsome of climatic stick techniques. At the Alubarna palace, Crocodile reveals that he wants to obtain Pluto in order to build the most powerful nation in the world, and that a bomb with a radius of 5 kilometers will explode in 30 minutes on the palace esplanade. At the same time, Zoro battles Mr 1, whose body is as strong as steel.

title: Slicing steel
description: Zoro tries to slice through Mr 1's steel body, but Mr 1 gets the better of his opponent.

title: Mr Bushido
description: Mr 1 seriously injures Zoro, but after getting up he remembers his master's words and finally manages to slice through Mr 1's steel body.
While Zoro collapses after defeating Mr 1, at Alubarna Palace, Crocodile easily defeats Chaka and the Tsumegeri.

title: Summit meeting
description: After arriving at Alubarna's palace, Koza discovers the truth about Crocodile's plan and tries to stop the rebellion with Vivi and the royal army when he is suddenly shot by an undercover soldier from Baroque Works.

title: 16h15
description: While the attack on Koza leads to renewed fighting on the palace esplanade, Vivi is attacked by Crocodile and thrown into the void, but Luffy arrives with Pell at Alubarna's palace.

title: Hope!
description: Luffy and Pell rescue Vivi and after bringing her to his companions, Luffy confronts Crocodile again with a barrel of water and manages to hit him, having realized that the Sand Fruit's weakness is water.

title: Aqua-Luffy
description: While Luffy continues to fight Crocodile with his water barrel, Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hat crew set off in search of the bomb.

title: Nico Robin
description: Crocodile uses his powers to turn all his surroundings into sand and ends up beating Luffy again by dehydrating him. Meanwhile, Nico Robin easily defeats Tashigi and the Navy while Cobra leads her to the pongeglyph.

title: The tomb of the royal family
description: Robin and Cobra arrive at the funeral temple where the poneglyph is located, joined shortly afterwards by Crocodile. Luffy manages to survive thanks to the water he had sent up into the sky earlier, but once at the temple, he collapses from exhaustion.

title: Smells like crocodile
description: Crocodile spears Robin after she reveals that there was nothing written about Pluto on the pongeglyph, while at the same time Vivi finds the bomb and Luffy gets up.

title: Red
description: While Luffy once again confronts Crocodile, who pulls out his poison hook, Vivi and the Straw Hat crew receive help from Tashigi and the Navy.

title: The sand clan's secret base
description: While Vivi and the crew of Chapeau de paille attempt to climb to the top of the clock tower where the bomb is located, along with Mr 7 and Miss Fathersday, Luffy continues his fight to the death against Crocodile, but is poisoned by the latter's hook.

title: Firing
description: While Luffy is still fighting Crocodile, the Straw Hat crew helps Vivi reach the top of the clock tower in a quick but unorthodox way.

title: The nightmare continues
description: While Luffy collapses from the effects of the poison, Vivi manages to reach the top of the clock tower and defeats Mr 7 and Miss Fathersday, but after extinguishing the bomb's fuse, she discovers that Crocodile had planned the whole thing and that the bomb is time-delayed.

title: The protecting god
description: While Luffy gets up and resumes his fight with Crocodile, Pell arrives at the top of the clock tower and takes the bomb up into the sky to explode it away from Alubarna.

title: I'll surpass you
description: While everyone is blown away by the bomb blast, unaware of Pell's sacrifice, the rebellion and the royal army rise to fight on. Vivi cries out for the fighting to stop, but as no one can hear her pleas, Nami begs her companions to try and stop them. At the same time, Luffy fights with all his might and finally defeats Crocodile.

title: Zero
description: Luffy's final attack sends Crocodile flying, but the fighting continues on the palace esplanade despite Baroque Works' total defeat. However, once it starts raining from nowhere, the fighting ceases and they hear Vivi's voice, ending the war as Cobra thanks Luffy for defeating Crocodile.

title: Majesty
description: With all the Baroque Works special agents defeated and arrested by the Navy, Vivi and Cobra end Alabasta's civil war with a speech to the people, while the Straw Hat crew all fall unconscious.

title: A sense of justice
description: As Alabasta celebrates the end of the war and the return of rain, Tashigi doesn't stop the Straw Hat crew, despite the fact that they've all fainted. As they are then taken to Alubarna Palace for treatment, the World Government decides to hide the truth and give credit for Crocodile's arrest to Smoker and Tashigi despite the colonel's refusal.

title: VIP
description: A few days later, the Straw Hat crew regain their strength at the Alubarna palace, but as they prepare to leave the country, Igaram and Chaka learn that Luffy's bounty is now 100 million berrys, while Zoro's head now has a price tag of 60 million berrys.

description: The Straw Hat crew dock on the west coast at Dressrosa and split into three groups. Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, Franky and Kinémon go to a restaurant where they meet an extremely powerful blind man.

title: The Colosseum corrida
description: Zoro's Shusui is stolen and he, Sanji and Kinémon go after the thieves. Luffy and Franky interrogate one of Doflamingo's servants, who reveals that Doflamingo is organizing a tournament at the Corrida Colosseum, with the winner receiving the pyro-fruit.

title: Changing rooms
description: Luffy enters the Colosseum tournament as Lucy, while Sanji meets a woman named Violette who asks him to protect her.

title: Lucy and the statue of Kyros
description: Luffy meets other gladiators such as Cavendish, Rebecca and the Chinjao Family, and learns that there will be four block battles for the first round. Rebecca shows him the statue of Kyros, a legendary gladiator, and the battle of Block A is over very quickly with the victory of Jesus Burgess, commander of Blackbeard's flagship.

title: Maynard the tracker
description: The lightning soldier asks Franky for help, while in the vestries of the Colosseum, Maynard, a vice-admiral at Navy headquarters, has managed to infiltrate the tournament but is defeated by Bartolomeo. The blind man in the restaurant turns out to be an admiral at Navy headquarters, known as Fujitora, while CP-0 roams Dressrosa.

title: I won't laugh at you anymore
description: The battle of Block B begins with Bartolomeo as participant, as well as Bellamy who recognizes Luffy under his disguise and reveals that he won't be laughing at him like before.

title: Block B
description: The battle for B Block rages on as Chinjao discovers Luffy's identity in the grandstand, revealing that he intends to kill him because of a past relationship with Garp.

title: The Coliseum of all dangers
description: Chinjao attacks Luffy but is stopped by his grandsons. The battle of Block B continues and, for some reason, no one is able to attack Bartolomeo.

title: King Punch!
description: Elizabello II uses his King Punch, knocking out all the combatants except Bartolomeo, who reveals that he is the holder of the barrier fruit before defeating Elizabello, thus winning the Battle of Block B.

title: On the road to Green Bit
description: Law's group makes their way across the bridge to Green Bit and Robin discovers that the Dressrosa fairies are actually dwarves.

title: Adventure in dwarf country
description: Robin and Usopp are captured by the dwarves but are easily freed due to their gullibility. On the beach at Green Bit, Sanji contacts Law and reveals that Doflamingo never left the Order of the Seven Great Privateers, while Doflamingo and Fujitora are about to arrive.

title: Block C, scene of a fierce battle
King Riku and his army in the field of flowers
A hero lurking in the shadows
Grand Corsaire vs Grand Corsaire - Doflamingo vs Law

In the fortress on the right flank
Ten days earlier
description: The Straw Hat crew reunites with Brook and they discover how their comrades escaped Big Mom's crew. After learning that Duke Caborage has awakened, Wanda takes the Straw Hat crew to meet him, and on the way she begins to tell them about Jack's invasion.

title: Duke Caborage
description: Wanda tells the Straw Hat crew how Jack invaded the principality of Mokomo to find Raizo of the Wa country after refusing to talk to the minks. Luffy and his companions then meet Caborage and learn that Jack has used a toxic weapon from Caesar to destroy the country.

title: Master Chavipère
description: Wanda explains the antagonistic relationship between Caborage and the other lord of the principality of Mokomo, Chavipère. During Jack's invasion, Caborage arrived to fight him, but withdrew at nightfall while Chavipère took over the fight.

title: The crew of Sourcil en vrille disembark
description: Jack fought the mink tribe for five days before using Caesar's gas. After torturing the minks for a day, Jack left to rescue Doflamingo, and the following day Sanji's group arrived in Zo to find the country in ruins.

title: Terminex
description: Sanji's group manage to chase away the Hundred Beasts crew members left on the island, and they manage to cure the mink tribe of gas poisoning. A few days later, however, Big Mom's crew arrive in Zo.

title: Capone Gang Bege
description: Capone Bege and Pekoms land in Zo, but Pekoms decides not to attack Sanji and his group after discovering that they have saved his tribe. However, Bege shoots Pekoms and he captures Sanji's group, then reveals that Sanji, as the third son of the Vinsmoke family, is to marry Pudding from the Charlotte family at Big Mom's tea party.

title: Invitation to the tea party
description: After being forced to go to the game of thén, Sanji writes a letter to his crew and manages to free Nami, Chopper and Brook from Bege's body, only for the latter to retreat when Chavipère arrives on the scene. Sanji writes in his letter that he's going to meet a woman and that he'll be back soon.

title: Meet Maître Chavipère
description: The crew of Chapeau de paille visit Chavipère and the still-recovering Pekoms, who reveals that the Vinsmoke family are murderers.

title: Take me with you!
description: Luffy decides to go with Pekoms to Big Mom's territory to rescue Sanji alone. While a banquet is being organized, Robin, Franky and Brook try to prevent the samurai from entering the country, but they end up falling asleep and the next day, Kinemon and Kanjuro reach the entrance to the principality of Mokomo.

title: Dog vs. Cat
description: The minks are alerted to the samurai's arrival, and Caborage and Chavipère send their troops to look for them. However, the two leaders come face to face and start fighting. However, the samurai stop fighting and the minks reveal that they had been hiding Raizo on the island all along.

title: Raizo of the mist
description: Kinémon reveals to the crew of Chapeau de paille that he is not Momonosuké's father, and that Momonosuké is in fact the son of the lord of the Kuri region of the Wa country, Oden Kozuki. After Caborage and Chapière reluctantly make peace, they take Straw Hat's crew, Law and the samurai to see Raizo in the whale, who is chained to a red poneglyph.

title: In the whale
description: Robin deciphers the poneglyph, revealing it to be one of the four "Road Poneglyphs" that lead to the location of Laugh Tale. The minks and samurai then reveal that it was the Kozuki clan who made the ponegyphs, and that Momonosuké's father, Oden Kozuki, traveled with Roger's crew but was executed by Kaido and the shogun of the Wa country.

title: Momonosuké, heir to the Kozuki clan
description: Momonosuké and his vassals ask Straw Hat's crew to help them reconquer the Wa country and defeat Kaido and the shogun, and Luffy agrees after forcing Momonosuké to take matters into his own hands, forming the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance. Meanwhile, Jack's fleet returns to Zo and the superstar intends to take down Zunesh.

title: A long history between dog and cat
description: Caborage and Chavipère talk about their trip with Roger's crew as the alliance prepares to split into several groups, with Chavipère intent on finding Marco the phoenix. However, the island begins to shake as Luffy hears a voice.

title: Aye, aye, sir!
description: Jack attacks Zunesh, who begs Luffy and Momonosuké to order him to strike back, which the latter does, and the elephant wipes out Jack's fleet with a single blow from his trunk.

title: The descent of the elephant
description: After everyone has recovered from Jack's attack, Momonosuké decides to stay on Zo, while Luffy's group, accompanied by the mink Pedro, leave Zo for Tougato Island to find Sanji.

title: A world in turmoil
description: Royal families from all over the world set off for Marie Joue to attend the Rêverie. Meanwhile, Carrot joins Luffy's group after being smuggled aboard, and Pedro reads a newspaper headline about the destruction of the Revolutionary Army's headquarters.

title: An original recipe
description: Luffy creates several mishaps aboard the Thousand Sunny, including using their entire rations to prepare an inedible meal. Meanwhile, Kaido, who owns Eustass Kidd, becomes enraged when he discovers Jack's failure and thinks back to Luffy and Law, and a few days later, on Big Mom's ship, Sanji sees a photo of his future wife, Charlotte Pudding.

title: The W.E.J. comic strip
description: On Big Mom's ship, Vito tells Sanji about the Germa 66 comic strip published in the W.E.J. A few days later, on the Sunny returning to Big Mom's territory, Luffy is on the verge of death after eating a poisonous fish, while the ship is boarded by a Germa 66 vessel.

title: 0 and 4
description: Luffy's group meets Sanji's little brother, Yonji, and big sister, Reiju. Reiju cures Luffy of his poisoning and the Germa 66 leave, pretending not to have seen anything. Meanwhile, Aladdin reports Luffy's arrival to Jinbe.

title: Totto Land
description: Luffy's group lands on Cacao Island, which is made entirely of chocolate. Luffy and Chopper get into trouble with the local authorities after eating a building, but are saved by Pudding, who takes them to her home. Meanwhile, on Tougato Island, Big Mom prepares for the tea party and learns of Luffy's arrival on her territory.

title: 1 and 2
description: Pudding agrees to help Luffy's group get to Tougato Island and rescue Sanji, but on returning to the Thousand Sunny, they discover that Pekoms has disappeared. Meanwhile, on Brock Collie Island, Sanji's two older brothers put an end to a civil war.

title: Charlotte Linlin
description: As Luffy's group sails along the path indicated by Pudding, on Tougato Island, Big Mom has an appetite disorder and goes on a rampage in Sweet City, but Jinbe arrives and puts a stop to her tantrum before starting to discuss something with her.

title: a promising boy
description: Jinbe, wanting to join Straw Hat's crew, asks Big Mom to leave his crew, but she forces him to pay the price. Meanwhile, Pedro reveals his past as Luffy's group reaches Tougato Island.

title: Adventure in the enchanted forest
description: While Brook and Pedro search for Big Mom's Road Pongeglyph, Luffy, Nami, Chopper and Carrot explore the Forest of Temptation, a strange forest with mysterious Sanji apparitions and living objects.

title: The kingdom of Germa
description: Luffy's group struggles to escape the Forest of Temptation when they are forced to battle Randolph and one of Big Mom's daughters, Charlotte Brûlée. Meanwhile, in the kingdom of Germa, Sanji is reunited with his father, Judge Vinsmoke.

title: Judge Vinsmoke
description: Sanji fights Judge but is defeated, and Judge has explosive bracelets placed on his wrists to prevent his escape.

title: My dream
description: Brook and Pedro infiltrate Sweet City and discover that Big Mom's crew is following their every move, while Capone Bege shoots Pekoms off a cliff and into a shark-infested sea. At Whole Cake Castle, Big Mom gives Caesar Clown two weeks to find a way to turn humans into giants in a factory built by Slurp, her eldest son. As night falls in the Forest of Temptation, Luffy continues to capture several animal-like versions of his teammates.

title: The land of souls
description: Nami reunites with Luffy after escaping from Brûlée, who has nevertheless captured Carrot and Chopper. They confront a large man buried in the ground, who reveals that everything in the Forest of Temptation has a soul thanks to Big Mom's demon fruit. He then reveals that he is Big Mom's former husband and the father of Chiffon and Laura, but at the same time, one of the three sweet generals, Charlotte Cracker, arrives on the scene and plans to kill him for revealing secrets.

title: Laura's life map
description: Nami realizes that Big Mom is Laura's mother and Cracker's presence terrifies the homies in the Forest of Temptation, but when he tries to kill Pound, Luffy stops him. Nami uses Laura's life card to fend off the homies, while Luffy and Cracker engage in combat.

title: Luffy vs General Cracker
description: Cracker effortlessly gets the better of Luffy while Brûlée tries to capture Nami, but the latter attacks her with lightning, sending her unconscious back to the world of mirrors. After being overpowered, Luffy finally manages to wound Cracker with the Gear Fourth.

title: Grand Fropper
description: Cracker reveals his true appearance and the powers of his demon fruit as he continues to battle Luffy. Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot decide to take advantage of the mirror world in which they are trapped. The next morning, Sanji's older brothers, Ichiji and Niji, arrive at Germa's kingdom.

title: Thanks for all those years!
description: Sanji comes into conflict with his family's values, but is forced to resist when Judge threatens to assassinate Zeff. Yonji then takes him to the cloning room that produces Germa 66 soldiers.

title: The iron mask
description: Sanji recalls his childhood, when he suffered due to his inability to develop his exoskeleton like his brothers and sister, which eventually led Judge to lock him up to pretend he never existed.

title: Heading for East Blue
description: Thirteen years ago, the kingdom of Germa entered East Blue to wage war, allowing Reiju to help Sanji escape. Eleven hours have passed since the battle between Cracker and Luffy began, and the latter has now become obese after eating the sweet general's cookie soldiers.

title: The power of full belly
description: Chopper and Carrot are chased by Brûlée inside the world of mirrors, while in the kingdom of Germa, the Vinsmoke family sets off for Whole Cake's castle. In the Forest of Temptation, Luffy manages to eat the cookie soldiers with the help of Nami's Rain, but when Cracker is about to attack the young pirate himself, Luffy activates the Gear Fourth's "Tank Man" form and manages to defeat the sugary general.

title: Sanji Vinsmoke
description: Cracker, defeated, flies to Sweet City and a general alert is declared. Luffy and Nami escape the Forest of Temptation and meet up with the Vinsmoke family, where they find Sanji. However, Sanji attacks Luffy and claims to have embraced his royal heritage.

title: Luffy vs Sanji
description: Sanji attacks Luffy severely, who refuses to defend himself, before returning to his family. However, Luffy vows to stay there until Sanji returns, leaving in tears.

title: The army of wrath
description: Big Mom creates a storm and sends the Army of Wrath to attack Luffy and Nami. She then meets the Vinsmoke family and Sanji and Pudding agree to marry.

title: The vigilance of the egg
description: Luffy and Nami are defeated and captured by the Army of Wrath, while Sanji negotiates with Big Mom for their survival. Meanwhile, Baron Delœuf and one of the Three Sweet Generals, Charlotte Smoothie, guard the treasure room that houses Big Mom's ponegyphs, while Brook and Pedro hatch a plan to break in.

title: Luffy and Big Mom
description: After showing the Vinsmoke family her collection of strange animals trapped in books, Big Mom contacts Luffy, who is also imprisoned in a book, by snail phone, but he continues to defy her.

title: Farewell
description: Pedro acts as bait and lures Smoothie and Baron Delœuf out of the treasure room, allowing Brook to sneak in. Meanwhile, in the prisoners' library, Pudding visits Luffy and Nami where she reveals something shocking.

title: Grand Froppe in the land of mirrors
description: Chopper and Carrot manage to defeat Brûlée and her clique in the world of mirrors, while Big Mom arrives in the treasure room and surprises Brook, and Pedro confronts Baron Delœuf in the gardens of Whole Cake Castle.

title: A ray of light
description: Pudding captures Reiju and she reveals her cruel nature and Big Mom's true plan: the extermination of the Vinsmoke family at the wedding. However, Sanji eventually overhears this from behind his bedroom window.

title: Old cigarette butt
description: Pudding frees Reiju after suppressing memories of their encounter with the powers of his demon fruit, while Brook battles Big Mom in the treasure room. Meanwhile, Jinbe arrives in the prisoners' library and attacks Charlotte Opera to free Luffy and Nami.

title: The Germa dud
description: Luffy tries to find Sanji in Whole Cake's castle by confronting Big Mom's crew. Meanwhile, Sanji talks to Reiju about Big Mom's plan, and she reveals that his bracelets are fake and there's nothing keeping him on the island.

title: It's not here
description: While Brook finds himself captured by Big Mom, Pedro ends his battle with Baron Delœuf by dropping explosives in the gardens before narrowly escaping into the world of mirrors. Meanwhile, Reiju meets Luffy and, after their meeting, decides to return to the place where he had promised Sanji to wait for him.

title: What was I thinking?!
description: Jinbe and Nami regroup with Chopper, Carrot and Pedro in the world of mirrors, while Big Mom and Pudding discuss the plan to assassinate the Vinsmoke family. Meanwhile, Sanji decides not to flee and prepares to die at the wedding, but suddenly attacks Bobbin after the latter tries to eat the piece of meat he had prepared for Luffy and then sets off in a specific direction.

title: Grouiiiic!!
description: After several attempts, the Mirror World group manage to free Brook from Big Mom's clutches while she was sleeping, and reveal that they had managed to make copies of the Empress's ponegyphs before she arrived in the treasure room. Meanwhile, Sanji meets up with Luffy where the latter had promised to wait for him.

title: Liar
description: Sanji gives Luffy the bento and, after Luffy forces him to tell his true feelings, the cook reveals that he wants to stay with Straw Hat's crew and save his family from being murdered, to which Luffy replies that he'll help him ruin the wedding ceremony.

title: Tower
description: The Mirror World group speak with Luffy and Sanji through a piece of mirror, and when they hear Sanji's conditions for returning to Thousand Sunny, Jinbe proposes to Luffy an alliance with Capone Bege as he wishes to assassinate Big Mom at the ceremony.

title: Meeting
description: Luffy's group meets the crew of the "Fire Tank" in their lair, as well as Caesar Clown, who has been recruited by Bege, and they begin to discuss the plan to assassinate Big Mom.

title: Operation regicide
description: Bege reveals his plan to assassinate Big Mom as the ceremony approaches.

title: 10 a.m., festivities begin
description: As the crew of the Sun Pirates flee from Totto Land, the Lords of the Shadow World arrive at Whole Cake Castle. While Charlotte Dent-de-chien, one of the three sweet generals and Big Mom's youngest son, aborts an attack thanks to her advanced perceptive fluid, Big Mom arrives at the reception area for the tea party to begin.

title: The commedienne
description: While the tea party is in full swing, Bege takes one last look at the assassination plan before entering the reception hall. It's finally time for the wedding ceremony, and Sanji and Pudding arrive at the tea party.

title: The strategist
description: As the wedding cake is presented and the Vinsmoke family is placed at a table encircled by the Charlotte family, the wedding begins but Pudding doesn't shoot Sanji after the latter compliments her on her third eye. As Sanji dodges Dogtooth's attack, chaos erupts when several Luffy enter the tea party venue through the wedding cake.

title: The paladin
description: As the wedding cake falls apart, Luffy tries to destroy the portrait of Mother Carmel, but Dogtooth stops him. After Jinbe officially breaks with Big Mom's crew, Brook takes advantage of the chaos to smash the portrait.

title: The Vinsmoke family threatened with extermination
description: After seeing the shattered portrait of Mother Carmel, Big Mom loses her mind but doesn't crack, and her crew attacks Luffy, Sanji, Jinbe and Pedro and also prepares to execute the Vinsmoke family by holding them at gunpoint. As Dent-de-chien orders Bege to kill Luffy, he disobeys him and Luffy prepares to show Big Mom the broken portrait again.

title: Say, Mother.....
description: Despite Dent-de-chien's intervention, Luffy manages to show Big Mom the broken portrait again, and she starts screaming, neutralizing his crew as the alliance protects itself with their earplugs. As Sanji saves his family and Bege, Vito and Gotti prepare to shoot a weakened Big Mom, she begins to remember her past.

title: Natural Born Destroyer
description: At the age of 5, Linlin was raised by Mother Carmel in Erbaf's orphanage, the "Bergerie". However, during the fast preceding the winter solstice festival, she destroyed the village of Erbaf.

title: Happy Birthday
description: After the Erbaf incident, the "Bergerie" was transferred to another island. However, at Linlin's 6th birthday party, Mother Carmel, who is actually an orphan seller, and the other orphans all disappeared.

title: KX launchers
description: Big Mom recalls the beginning of her pirate career as Bege, Vito and Gotti fire the KX launchers to assassinate her. However, her screams destroy the launchers and the mirror that was to have been used for the alliance's escape, and Big Mom's crew close in on the alliance after protecting their ears with the powers of Dogtooth's demon fruit. Nevertheless, Bege is transformed into a giant fortress.

title: Beleaguered
description: While the alliance takes refuge in Bege's fortress and the Germa 66s rescue Nami, Chopper and Carrot after recovering their Raid Suit, the alliance soon finds itself under siege from Big Mom's crew. The Empress comes to her senses and attacks Bege herself.

title: Separation
description: After Bege sets up an escape plan and Sanji settles scores with Judge, Caesar attempts to flee by air carrying Bege while the Vinsmoke family protects them from Big Mom's crew, but when the Empress is about to kill Reiju, Luffy and Sanji emerge from the castle and hold off her attack.

title: Courage, César!
description: Despite the escape attempt, Big Mom's crew easily defeats Luffy and his allies and prepares to put them to death. However, the Tamate chest falls to the base of Whole Cake's castle and explodes, causing it to collapse.

title: Smooth and creamy
description: Thanks to the collapse of Whole Cake's castle, the alliance manages to escape and separates once they're out of the woods. As Big Mom's crew get back on their feet after being rescued by Streusen, Big Mom's appetite troubles awaken with a craving for wedding cake.

title: Impasse pâtissière
description: As Slurp lies to Big Mom to direct her appetite troubles at the Straw Hat crew and Pudding plans to remake a wedding cake with Chiffon, the Empress arrives in front of Luffy's group and prepares to attack.

title: Be my servant
description: Luffy's group uses King Baum to escape Big Mom's assault, but Prometheus attacks them by burning the Forest of Temptation. As Dent-de-chien arrives on Thousand Sunny, Pudding tries to convince Chiffon to help him remake a wedding cake.

title: A loyal wife
description: Nami successfully manipulates Zeus and uses him to unleash an enormous lightning column on Big Mom and her crew. While Chopper and Brook arrive on the Thousand Sunny, which is full of enemies, Pudding and Chiffon find Luffy's group.

title: A chance encounter with Pudding!
description: As Big Mom continues to pursue Luffy's group, Pudding and Chiffon ask Sanji to come with them to Cacao Island to help remake the wedding cake, with Pudding torn between his feelings of love and murder for Sanji.

title: Merciless
description: Despite a proud battle with Big Mom's crew, Chopper and Brook are overpowered by Slurp and begin to turn them into candy. However, Luffy's group, still pursued by Big Mom, then reaches the Thousand Sunny and Luffy begins to fight Dent-de-chien, but as Slurp blocks the ship with his sweets, Pedro sacrifices himself by blowing himself up with Big Mom's eldest son, allowing the Thousand Sunny to free itself.

title: Pedro le mink, leader of the Guardians
description: Thanks to Pedro's sacrifice, and despite Slurp's survival, Thousand Sunny manages to escape from Tougato Island, evading Big Mom. However, Luffy takes Dent-de-chien to the world of mirrors to fight a duel.

title: Dent-de-chien, sweet general of Big Mom's crew
description: The Thousand Sunny group recovers from Pedro's death, but Big Mom closes in on them thanks to the powers of Slurp's demon fruit. In the world of mirrors, Dogtooth clearly dominates Luffy in their duel.

title: No way out
description: Sanji, Pudding and Chiffon arrive on Cacao Island to start making the wedding cake, while the Thousand Sunny group is attacked on several fronts and Luffy is still dominated by Dent-de-chien in the world of mirrors.

title: At the bottom of the wave
description: Jinbe uses his helming skills to steer Sunny through the "Green Room" wave created by Big Mom, while Luffy continues to suffer attacks from Dogtooth.

title: What not even an Emperor can foresee
description: In the World of Mirrors, Luffy dodges Dent-de-chien's spear and awakened power techniques, while on the waters of Totto Land, Big Mom heads for Walnut Island, and in the Kingdom of Germa, the Germa 66 have defeated the group of Big Mom's crew who attacked them.

title: Marienda
description: Luffy discovers Dent-de-chien's secret and face when the latter was doing his merienda, causing the general to lose concentration and allowing Luffy to hit him with his Gear Fourth.

title: Who the hell is he?!
description: After suffering several blows, Dent-de-chien regains the upper hand against Luffy, while Oven arrives on Cacao Island and Praliné uses her singing skills to draw all the sea slugs from the waters of Totto Land towards her.

title: My name is Brûlée!
description: Luffy uses Brûlée to escape the world of mirrors after the time limit on his Gear Fourth expires, but he finds himself in the middle of Big Mom's rampage on Walnut Island, while on the waters of Totto Land, all the ships of Big Mom's crew are searching for their enemies.

title: This is how your father chose to live
description: Sanji, Pudding and Chiffon prepare to take the wedding cake out to sea to bring it to Big Mom, and Oven tries to kill Chiffon for her rebellion, but she is saved thanks to the interventions of Sanji and Bege, who arrives on the scene. Meanwhile, Luffy uses Totto Land's various mirrors to escape until his fluid returns.

title: Somewhere, someone's longing for your happiness
description: Sanji manages to put the wedding cake on the Nostra Castello, which manages to escape from Cacao Island, but when Oven attempts to sink the ship with the powers of the fruit of heat, Pound sacrifices himself by distracting his son-in-law. Meanwhile, Big Mom and her fleet find the Thousand Sunny group.

title: Lioness
description: As Luffy returns to the world of mirrors to fight Dent-de-chien, Big Mom's crew encircles the Thousand Sunny group, but Carrot uses his Sulong form to reach Daifuku's ship and break the rudder.

title: A Mamma from the realm of the unknown
description: Carrot decimates part of Daifuku's fleet by turning his powers against him, and while Sanji's group is on its way to Big Mom, Big Mom herself attacks the Thousand Sunny group by landing on the ship.

title: Big Mom on board
description: Using their abilities, the Thousand Sunny group manages to mount a counter-attack to push Big Mom off the ship and Nami manages to capture Zeus.

title: They're counting on me!
description: In the world of mirrors, Luffy tries to train his perceptive fluid while dodging Dogtooth's attacks, while Sanji's group finishes the wedding cake and approaches Big Mom.

title: Recognized as powerful adversaries
description: Bege lures Big Mom with the wedding cake onto his ship, while Sanji reunites with his crew, pursued by Smoothie, and they continue on to Cacao Island, which is surrounded by a gigantic armada. In the world of mirrors, Luffy is pierced in the abdomen by Dogtooth.

title: Flampée, 36th daughter of the Charlotte family
description: In the world of mirrors, Flampée interferes in the duel between Luffy and Dent-de-chien, enabling her to hit her opponents with powerful attacks. However, after discovering his sister's interference, Dent-de-chien wounds his own abdomen to compensate, and after both opponents attack Flampée and her subordinates with their royal fluid, Dent-de-chien considers Luffy a first-rate fighter.

title: Five minutes to midnight
description: Time continues to pass, as Big Mom closes in on Bege's ship and the Thousand Sunny group approaches Cacao Island despite Smoothie's attacks. In the world of mirrors, after an intense battle lasting several hours, Luffy decides to put an end to the fight by activating a new form of Gear Fourth known as "Snake Man".

title: Luffy the pirate vs Dent-de-chien the sweet general
description: With the powers of the Gear Fourth's "Snake Man" form, Luffy fights Dogtooth on equal terms, and their duel comes to an end when they both unleash their most powerful attacks.

title: One last service
description: As Sanji and the Thousand Sunny group arrive at Cacao Island, Luffy defeats Dent-de-chien and prepares to leave the world of mirrors with Pekoms' help, while Oven and his army wait behind the only mirror on Cacao Island to ambush him.

title: Pekoms' escape plan
description: With the help of Pekoms and Sanji, Luffy manages to escape Oven's army, but they find themselves trapped before the Germa 66 arrive to rescue them.

title: I promise to come back
description: The Vinsmoke family help Sanji and Luffy escape Cacao Island and return to the Thousand Sunny.

title: The last bastion
description: Bege deposits the wedding cake on Moelleuse Island for Big Mom to eat, while off the coast of Cacao Island, the Germa 66s and the crew of the Pirates of the Sun help Luffy's group escape the armada of Big Mom's crew.

title: Bad End Musical
description: Big Mom ends up eating the wedding cake, putting an end to her appetite troubles, while on and near Cacao Island, her crew manages to get the better of Luffy's group, the Germa 66s and the crew of the Pirates of the Sun.

title: Even if you die, I forbid you to die!
description: As Big Mom sets off for Cacao Island after coming to her senses, Jinbe sets out to help the Sun Pirates crew keep Big Mom's armada busy long enough for Luffy's group to escape from Totto Land.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: End Roll
description: While Brûlée treats Dogtooth's wounds in the Mirror World, Luffy's group manages to escape the waters of Totto Land, while Big Mom joins the battle against Germa 66 and the crew of the Pirates of the Sun.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: The fifth emperor
description: As the Reverie approaches, the whole world learns of Luffy's actions on Totto Land, his new bounty of one billion and 500 million berrys and his new notoriety, which now equals that of the Four Emperors. Meanwhile, Kobby and Hermep protect the ships of the kingdoms of Dressrosa and Prodence on their way to Marie Joie.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: Revolutionary Army troop commanders take to the stage
description: Two days before the start of the Reverie, the four troop commanders of the Revolutionary Army save the island of Rourucia from Pinkbeard as they prepare to meet with Dragon about their forthcoming declaration of war.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: A wonderful world
description: Fujitora arrives at Marie Joie just as the royal families start arriving for the Rêverie.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie
description: Several royal families whom Luffy has helped in the past meet up and start talking about him. Meanwhile, a certain someone goes to see a straw hat that is kept in a cold room at Marie Joie.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: The empty throne
description: At Marie Joie's Pangea Castle, Stelly goes to see the vacant throne while outside, Charloss attempts to kidnap Shirahoshi with the help of CP-0 before being stopped by Myosgard. Meanwhile, Big Mom makes contact with Kaido about Luffy, while Shanks goes to the Hall of Power at Pangaea Castle to speak with the Council of Five Elders.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: Opening of the Rếverie
description: Jewelry Bonney and the Revolutionary Army infiltrate the land of the gods of Marie Joie, where they discover that Bartholomew Kuma is being used as a slave by Roswald. At the same time, the Rêverie begins and the sovereigns gather around the same table. Meanwhile, the five deans discuss the need to clean up as they make their way to the vacant throne on which Imu sits, then kneel before him.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: Seppuku
description: Marco declines Chavipère's offer to join the fight against Kaido. Meanwhile, in Wa country, Zoro finds himself under arrest for murder, but just as he's supposed to commit seppuku, he shoots the commissioner, who is the real killer.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: En route to Wa country
description: Luffy's group arrives in Wa country, but Luffy is separated from his companions after the Thousand Sunny is caught in a whirlpool and he finds himself alone on a beach in Wa country.

tome.title: The Holy Land of Marie Joie

title: Adventure in samurai land
description: Luffy rescues a young girl named Tama from the Hundred Beasts crew and meets her master, Hitetsu Tenguyama. However, Tama falls ill from drinking polluted water.

title: The village of Amigasa
description: Luffy acquires Hitetsu's cursed sword, the second Kitetsu, and takes Tama to the nearest village for treatment. He meets up with Zoro on the way, but they are confronted by Basil Hawkins, a star of the Hundred Beasts crew.

title: Tsuru's gratitude
description: After a brief battle, Luffy, Zoro and Tama escape. Tsuru, a woman Zoro had saved earlier, offers to repay her debt by healing Tama.

title: The village of leftovers
description: Tama is healed, but is then kidnapped by two Gifters. Luffy and Zoro set off to rescue her, and are joined by a woman named Kiku who claims to be a samurai.

title: Bakura
description: Luffy, Zoro and Kiku travel to the city of Bakura, home of the yokozuna Urashima. Urashima tries to marry Kiku, but she responds by cutting off his bun.

title: Sumo wrestling in the land of the Wa
description: Luffy challenges Urashima to a sumo wrestling match and wins. However, he accidentally destroys the house of star Holdem, who is holding Tama hostage.

title: The Ark of Plenty
description: Luffy, Zoro and Kiku battle the Hundred Beasts crew in the city of Bakura, then Luffy frees Tama by defeating Holdem.

title: Luffytaro's gratitude
description: Law fights briefly with Hawkins before finding Luffy and Zoro, who escape with Kiku, Tama and the Ark of Plenty, which they take to the remnants village.

title: The ruins of Oden Castle
description: Law takes Luffy to the ruins of Oden Castle, where he reunites with Kinémon, Momonosuké and the part of his crew with whom he had parted company before landing in the land of the Wa. Kinémon makes a startling revelation, telling us that his group of samurai had traveled 20 years into the future.

title: Everyone loves Oden
description: Kinémon talks about the life of Momonosuke's father, Oden Kozuki, and how he was murdered 20 years earlier. To avenge Oden, Kinémon plans for the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance to make a surprise attack on Kaido Island, Onigashima, in two weeks' time.

title: Shutenmaru
description: Kinemon entrusts the Straw Hat crew with various tasks in order to recruit allies for the Kozuki clan throughout the Wa country. Meanwhile, Jack confronts a thief named Shutenmaru, but their battle is interrupted when Kaido, transformed into a dragon, arrives in the skies over the Kuri region to order Jack to bring Luffy and Law back to him.

title: Kaido, chief commander of the Hundred Beasts crew
description: Kaido, drunk, tries to find Luffy and Law and destroys the ruins of Oden Castle before being attacked by Luffy.

title: Kaido the Emperor vs Luffy
description: After discovering that Kaido had attacked Tama before arriving at the remnants village, Luffy attacks the Emperor with his most powerful attacks, but is defeated by the latter with a single blow from his club.

title: Koâââ?!
description: The whole Wa country learns of Luffy's defeat at Kuri as he is taken to the prison quarry in the Udon region.

title: Lost time
description: Gecko Moria invades Blackbeard's island, the "Hive", but discovers that Blackbeard's crew has killed Absalom and that Shiliew has seized the powers of his demon fruit. In the land of the Wa, Kinémon finds Shutenmaru, whose real name is Ashura Doji, who once served under Oden, but he refuses to help the Kozuki clan again.

title: The prisoners' quarry
description: The Straw Hat crew performs allied recruitment and espionage duties in the Flower Capital. Meanwhile, in the Udon region, Luffy and Eustass Kidd become the stars of the prisoners.

title: O-Toko the apprentice
description: Sanji sets up a soba shop in the flower capital and, with Franky's help, defeats Kyoshiro's threatening yakuza gang.

title: The great courtesan Komurosaki
description: The great courtesan Komurasaki is on her way to Shogun Orochi's banquet, and on the way she is briefly confronted by men she has swindled.

title: Orochi Kurozumi, shogun of the Wa country
description: Franky searches for the plans to Kaido Castle. Meanwhile, Orochi meets CP-0 and demands that they give him Vegapunk if they want to continue the Wa Country arms deal.

title: Ebisu village
description: Big Mom's crew attempt to enter Wa land to kill Luffy, but are repelled by Superstar King of the Hundred Beasts crew, causing Big Mom to fall into the sea. Meanwhile, the Tobi Roppo Page One confronts Sanji in retaliation for his fight against Kyoshiro's gang.

title: O-Saba Mask
description: Sanji dons his Raid Suit to fight Page One. Meanwhile, Robin is unmasked by Orochi's spies while searching for information in her castle, and Chopper discovers that Big Mom has washed up on Kuri beach and suffered amnesia.

title: The shogun and the great courtesan
description: Chaos erupts at Orochi Castle when Komurasaki slaps Orochi for trying to kill his apprentice Toko after she mocked him.

title: The warrior's compassion
description: Komurasaki is sliced open by the Kurozumi clan's shifter, Kyoshiro, and Nami and Brook step in to help Robin and Toko escape Orochi and his spies.

title: Hyogoro of the flower
description: Chopper, Momonosuké, Tama and Kiku decide to go to the Udon area with Big Mom. Nami's group take refuge in the Ringo area and Kanjuro tells them about the former yakuza leader, Hyogoro. Hyogoro is now being held prisoner in the Udon region under the name of Grandpa Hyo, but when he is attacked by Trouduc, Luffy defends him by attacking the star.

title: Queen
description: Raizo steals the key to Luffy's handcuffs, but superstar Queen of the Hundred Beasts crew arrives at the prisoners' quarry and Luffy and Hyogoro are brought before him to be sentenced to death.

title: The Sumo Inferno
description: Luffy and Hyogoro are placed in an arena and must fight Queen's subordinates to the death. Meanwhile, Sanji uses his Raid Suit to spy on Nami, Robin and Shinobu in the bathhouse, but they have to escape when Drake and Hawkins attack them.

title: Gyukimaru of the Gatherers' Bridge
description: A soldier-monk named Gyukimaru steals Shusui in order to bring him back to Ryuma's tomb. Zoro fights him on the Gatherers' Bridge in the Ringo area to get him back, but Komurasaki and Toko arrive on the scene, pursued by the assassin Kamazo. Zoro battles against Kamazo and defeats him.

title: A woman's secret
description: Orochi and Kaido's henchmen discover the meaning of the Kozuki clan's secret message and arrest everyone with a crescent-moon tattoo on their ankle. Shinobu accuses Law's captured men of leaking the information, leading Law to quarrel with her. Meanwhile, in the Ringo area, Komurasaki treats Zoro's wounds and she reveals herself to be Momonosuké's sister, Hiyori Kozuki.

title: Once a warrior, always a warrior
description: In the prisoners' quarry in the Udon region, Luffy tries to learn how to project the offensive fluid from his palm. He fails, but Hyogoro attacks Alpagaman and reveals that he knows how to use it.

title: The spark of insurrectop,
description: Tonoyasu, a resident of Ebisu village, promises to help in the final battle. Meanwhile, in Udon, the Sumo Inferno is stopped for the night and Hyogoro meets up with Raizo, revealing that tens of thousands of rebels are being held in the prisoners' quarry.

title: The darling of Ebisu village
description: Tonoyasu is captured and it is revealed that his real name is Yasuie, the former lord of the Hakumai region. Orochi has him crucified and Toko races to the Flower Capital to save his father.

title: Yasui Shimotsuki
description: Yasuie fools Orochi's henchmen into believing that the message circulating calling Kozuki clan allies to arms was a joke, before he is shot dead by Orochi and his men.

title: Smiles
description: Toko and the people of Ebisu village laugh at Yasuie's death, and Hiyori explains to Zoro that this is because Orochi has given them defective "SMILES" that force them to always laugh whatever their emotions.

title: Comrade
description: The Straw Hat crew fight Orochi's henchmen to protect Toko and Yasuie's body. Meanwhile, Kidd and Kamazo are captured and taken to the prisoners' quarry, where Kamazo is revealed to be Killer, the fighter from Kidd's crew.

title: O-Lin
description: Big Mom bursts into the prisoners' quarry to eat shiruko, and when Queen stands in her way, she brutally attacks her.

title: Queen vs O-Lin
description: Big Mom beats Queen and discovers that Luffy has eaten all the shiruko, prompting her to attack, but this allows the young pirate and Hyogoro to be freed from the arena.

title: Le pari e Queen
description: Queen inadvertently recovers Big Mom's memory, but she falls asleep, forcing him to leave the Udon area and take her to Onigashima.

title: Kawamatsu the kappa enters the scene
description: Raizo frees the red scabbard Kawamatsu from his cell and the latter joins Luffy, Hyogoro, Chopper, Raizo and Kiku in the rebellion to bring the Udon region under their control.

title: Mummy
description: Luffy convinces his fellow prisoners to rebel against the crew of the Hundred Beasts, enabling them to take control of the Udon region.

title: A warrior's dream
description: Ashura Doji shows Kinémon and Caborage the graveyard of the samurai who attacked Kaido 10 years before their return, then in memory of Oden, he decides to join the Kozuki clan and attack Onigashima on the night of the Fire Festival. Meanwhile, in the Flower Capital, Hawkins and Drake capture Law.

title: Rampage
description: Orochi's henchmen post wanted posters for the Straw Hat crew and their allies across Wa country. Meanwhile, Ashura shows Kinemon and Caborage the ships, which will take their allies to Onigashima, where Kaido is currently battling Big Mom.

title: Hiyori and Kawamatsu
description: Raizo reports the takeover of the Udon region to Kinemon, and Luffy meets the yakuza chiefs of the various regions of Wa country. Meanwhile, in the Ringo region, Zoro and Hiyori return to take back Shusui from Gyukimaru, meeting Kawamatsu along the way.

title: Clothes don't make the man
description: Kawamatsu reveals that a few years earlier, he had collected and stored hundreds of swords in the Ringo region for his allies in the final battle, in the company of a fox named Onimaru . Unbeknownst to him and Zoro, Gyukimaru is actually Onimaru, transformed into a soldier-monk.

title: An even more powerful dragon
description: As the Festival of Fire and the battle against Kaido approach, the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance discuss final preparations before attacking Onigashima. However, the crew of the hundred beasts is increasing its forces, with the arrival of the Numbers and its new alliance with the crew of Big Mom.

title: Enma
description: With war fast approaching, Luffy trains with the advanced offensive fluid, while Zoro does the same with his new sword, Enma. On the eve of the Fire Festival, the Red Sheaths, Momonosuké and Shinobu set off to meet their allies at the rendezvous port, while Orochi is briefed on the actions of the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance.

title: Big New
description: After the end of the Reverie, the royal families return to their kingdoms and the world is informed of the abolition of the Order of the Seven Great Privateers. Meanwhile, X-Drake, who is actually the commander of the "Sword", a secret elite unit of the Navy, shares information with Kobby about events in the land of Wa.

title: Ultimate
description: With the abolition of the Order of the Seven Great Privateers and the alliance between Kaido and Big Mom, two of the Four Emperors, the Navy soldiers discuss the future, and Sengoku explains the history of Rocks' crew to the young soldiers.

title: Our port of call
description: The day of the Fire Festival has arrived, and Orochi joins Kaido on Onigashima for the banquet, while the Flower Capital celebrates the event. Meanwhile, the Kinemon group discovers that their plan is not going according to plan, as their allies are not at the rendezvous port.

title: Samurai
description: As Orochi's counter-attack is revealed, the Kinemon group decide to head for Onigashima alone with a boat, even though they know it's a suicide mission, as they are determined to avenge Oden Kozuki and fulfill his wish.

title: Oden Kozuki takes the stage
description: 41 years ago, Oden Kozuki became known as a troublemaker in the flower capital. The young Kinemon is trying to earn money and meets Denjiro and Oden when a giant animal attacks the flower capital.

title: The mountain god incident
description: Oden fights and defeats the mountain god and frees the victims, earning the respect and admiration of Kinémon and Denjiro, but being disowned by his father, the shogun of the Wa country, he is excluded from the capital of flowers.

title: A lord and his vassals
description: Traveling through Wa country, Oden acquires new "servants", namely Izo, Kikunojo, Kanjuro and Raizo, and eventually ends up in the lawless region of Kuri, where he decides to settle down and help its inhabitants, earning him the title of lord of the Kuri region and his father's approval. 6 years later, two strange creatures are found by Kawamatsu on the beach.

title: And they became samurai
description: After recruiting Kawamatsu, Caborage and Chavipère into their ranks, Oden's vassals decide to steal money from the lord of the Hakumai region, Yasuie Shimotsuki, who, despite having caught them, gives them money and advice on how to serve Oden well as a vassal. 3 years later, the Moby Dick and Whitebeard's crew run aground on the beach in the Kuri region, and Oden rushes to Whitebeard to ask him to join his crew.

title: Oden's adventure
description: Despite their refusal, Oden is determined to leave with the crew of Whitebeard and, after clinging to the stern of the ship, is put to a test to show his dedication. Only, just before passing the test, Oden goes to an island to help a woman in distress, turning out to be Toki Amatsuki, and is then officially recruited into Whitebeard's crew. After several adventures with his new crew, Oden has become infamous and attracts the interest of Gol D. Roger.

title: The Kurozumi clan plot
description: On the Moby Dick, Oden and Toki fall in love, and in the years that follow they start a family. However, in the land of the Wa, Orochi takes advantage of Oden's absence to hatch a plan to take over as shogun.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: Roger and Whitebeard
description: Whitebeard's crew meet and fight Roger's crew, and after 3 days of fighting, Oden decides to accompany Roger to help him find the last island of the New World.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: Roger's adventure
description: After finding the Road Poneglyphs, Oden and Roger's crew reach the last island of the New World, where Roger finds a treasure left by a certain Joy Boy, whose story makes him laugh and leads him to name the island "Laugh Tale".

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: The return of Oden
description: Roger disbands his crew and Oden returns to the land of the Wa. There, he discovers that his father has since died, but also that Orochi has become shogun, and that he had tried to kill Momonosuké via his henchmen, prompting him to attack Orochi in the flower capital.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: Sire jester
description: Because of the Kurozumi clan's demon-fruit powers, Oden is unable to kill Orochi and is forced to dance naked in the street every week. 5 years later, after Orochi reveals that he has broken a promise to Hyogoro, Oden and his vassals decide to fight Kaido.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: Oden vs Kaido
description: The Kozuki clan and the crew of the hundred beasts engage in a merciless battle, but Kaido eventually defeats Oden. Oden and the nine red sheaths are then condemned to death.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: Death by scalding
description: Oden and his vassals are condemned to be scalded alive, but Oden makes a deal that they will all be released if they survive for an hour. So, after entering the thatch first, he lifts a plank, on which his nine vassals stand, above his head while standing in the boiling oil.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: Boiling is what Oden is all about
description: Oden survives for an hour, but Orochi returns to the market at the last minute. Oden throws the plank containing his vassals out of the cauldron, allowing them to escape, before Kaido shoots and kills him, making Oden's body disappear into the boiling oil.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: The Kozuki line
description: The Nine Red Scabbards race to Oden Castle to save the Kozuki family from the Hundred Beasts crew, then once there, Toki sends Momonosuké and the Kinemon group into the future. After Oden Castle burns down and Toki dies, Denjiro's appearance changes as he is consumed by rage, and he decides to become the leader of a yakuza gang, calling himself Kyoshiro to get closer to Orochi and his guard, to prepare for the final battle and to protect Hiyori.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: En route to Onigashima Island
description: Back in the present, the Nine Red Scabbards are confronted by a fleet of the Hundred Beasts crew, and Kanjuro reveals that he is the spy who was supplying Orochi with all the information on the Kozuki clan. However, Luffy, Law and Kid come to the samurai's rescue in time.

tome.title: Boiling is what Oden is all about

title: The Kinémon plan
description: The rest of the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance joins the nine red sheaths at the port of Tokage, having successfully thwarted Kanjuro and Orochi's plans due to an error in Kinemon's planned stratagem.

title: Allow me to introduce myself
description: Kanjuro flies to Onigashima with Momonosuké, and Jinbe arrives in Wa country to join the Straw Hat crew for good.

title: Stop!
description: The ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance arrives near Onigashima and begins its infiltration.

title: Tobi Roppo take to the stage
description: As the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance begins to advance on the island, the Tobi Roppo of the Hundred Beasts crew are brought together for an interview with Kaido.

title: Family problems
description: Kaido asks the Tobi Roppo to find his son, Yamato.

title: Fighting music
description: Luffy and Zoro are spotted in Kaido's castle and attacked by Scratchmen Apoo.

title: Reinforcements
description: Luffy, Zoro, Kidd and Killer, now unmasked, battle the Hundred Beasts crew. Big Mom's crew try again to reach the land of the Wa, but are repulsed by Marco as he heads for Onigashima with Chavipère, Izo and the Guardians.

title: The clash of the insolent
description: Kanjuro brings Momonosuké to Orochi and Kaido, while part of the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance is attacked by Big Mom.

title: Thunder
description: Luffy meets two Tobi Roppo from the Hundred Beasts crew, Ulti and Page One, and fights against them. However, Yamato intervenes in the fight and runs off with Luffy to talk to him.

title: My bible
description: Kaido interrupts Momonosuké's execution to announce his plans for the "new Onigashima". Meanwhile, Luffy discovers Yamato's true appearance and objectives.

title: The new Onigashima project
description: The nine red scabbards confront Kanjuro, while Kaido betrays Orochi by decapitating him and revealing his and Big Mom's plan to transform the land of the Wa and take over the whole world.

title: My name is
description: Faced with his imminent execution at the hands of Kaido, Momonosuké finds the courage to proclaim that he is the son of Oden in front of the entire concert hall. After their victory over Kanjuro, the nine red scabbards arrive in front of Kaido and launch a joint attack.

title: The nine ronins
description: The nine red scabbards successfully pierce Kaido's skin using the same level of "current" as Oden. After getting up, Kaido and the nine red scabbards decide to continue their fight on the Onigashima dome.

title: Sorry to keep you waiting
description: The Mink tribe join the nine red sheaths on the dome and activate their Sulong forms to confront Kaido and Jack's henchmen. In the concert space, Sanji saves Momonosuké but is forced to confront King, while the other members of the Straw Hat crew face an enraged Big Mom.

title: I don't think we're going to lose
description: After ejecting Big Mom from the concert space, the entire Straw Hat crew reunites against King, Queen and the Numbers, and they and the samurai decide to create a path for Luffy to reach the top of the dome.

title: A lone soldier
description: Queen and Who's Who unmask X-Drake as an undercover spy in the Hundred Beasts crew, forcing him to join the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance and fight alongside them.

title: Let us join him!
description: Kaido prepares to fight the nine red sheaths after Caborage and Chavipère, in their Sulong forms, defeat Jack.

title: Former
description: The nine red scabbards attack Kaido with a variety of techniques which, to his astonishment, are capable of injuring him.

title: The dream of Wa land
description: As Luffy makes his way to the top of the dome, Queen attacks the ninja-pirate-mink-samurai alliance with a new virus.

title: My other name is Yamato
description: Queen gives the antidote to the "ice demon" virus to Apoo, forcing Zoro and Drake to team up and chase him through space in concert to retrieve it. Meanwhile, Yamato protects Momonosuké and Shinobu from the attack of Sasaki and the armored division of the Hundred Beasts crew.

title: The ninja woman's oath
description: Tama and Komachiyo arrive on Onigashima and rescue Nami and Usopp after their defeat by Ulti and Page One.

title: The island of the strongest
description: Franky starts fighting Sasaki, allowing Yamato to escape with Momonosuké and Shinobu. On the dome, Kaido gains the upper hand over the nine red scabbards.

title: Flames
description: Sanji is lured into a trap by Black Maria, while in concert space, Zoro defeats Apoo and gives Chopper the antidote to the "ice demon" virus. After defeating the nine red scabbards, Kaido uses his powers to lift Onigashima into the air to transport the island to the Flower Capital.

title: Antique Zoan
description: Jinbe begins his confrontation with Who's Who as he, Sasaki and Black Maria reveal their ancient Zoan demon fruit powers.

title: This sake I made for you
description: Yamato recalls his encounter with Ace a few years earlier, while Big Mom joins Kaido on the dome.

title: Luffy au Chapeau de paille
description: Luffy, Zoro, Law, Kidd and Killer arrive at the top of the dome to face Kaido and Big Mom.

title: The final battle of the Onigashima monsters
description: The battle between the five members of the "terrible generation" and the two Emperors begins.

title: Emperors vs. the new generation
description: The five members of the "terrible generation" manage to stand up to Kaido and Big Mom.

title: Night on the Go plateau
description: While CP-0 follows the progress of the war from a hidden room on Onigashima, Kaido activates his hybrid form.

title: Kibi Dango
description: With the help of Nami and Usopp, Tama uses her powers to tame the Gifters of the Hundred Beasts crew and make them her servants.

title: The demon's child
description: Robin and Brook rescue Sanji from Black Maria and decide to confront him.

title: The Hyogoro yakuza of the flower
description: After temporarily regaining his youthful strength when he was about to die of the "ice demon" virus, Hyogoro managed to defeat several members of the Hundred Beasts crew.

title: Raccoon
description: Chopper succeeds in creating a cure for the "ice demon" virus and he cures all those infected.

title: Ashura Doji, leader of the Mount Atama gang of thieves
description: Kanjuro reveals he's still alive and sends a drawing of Oden to trap the nine red scabbards, but Ashura sacrifices himself to protect his companions from his attack.

title: Ragnaraka
description: Orochi, still alive, confronts the nine red scabbards but is quickly put out of action. Meanwhile, on the dome, the five members of the "terrible generation" succeed in toppling Big Mom of Onigashima by depriving her of Zeus and Prometheus.

title: Royal Fluid
description: Luffy realizes he can coat his body with the royal fluid and uses it to challenge Kaido to a duel, while Kidd and Killer decide to take on Big Mom and Zoro and Law descend into the dome.

title: In honor of Shiruko
description: Big Mom returns to the dome where she meets up with Tama and, after learning that the remnants' village had been burnt down by the crew of the Hundred Beasts, she defeats Page One in a single blow.

title: Impatience
description: A three-way battle ensues between Tama's group, Ulti and Big Mom.

title: Anarchy In The Big Mom
description: Big Mom takes Ulti down but is confronted by Kidd before she can attack Tama's group.

title: Life's ham
description: Kaido defeats Luffy before entering the dome to find Momonosuké. Kanjuro finds him first, but is shot down by Kinemon, before the latter is in turn taken down by Kaido.

title: Link
description: While Sanji begins his confrontation with Queen, Kaido completes Kinémon and pursues Momonosuké and Shinobu, only to find himself confronted by Yamato.

title: It's me, O-Tama
description: Nami finishes off Ulti with the help of Zeus, while Yamato and Kaido begin their confrontation.

title: Orders
description: Tama manages to broadcast her orders across Onigashima to the Gifters she has tamed, causing chaos among the crew of the hundred beasts.

title: Jinbe vs Who's Who
description: After several exchanges of blows, Jinbe manages to defeat Who's Who.

title: Hékuceratops
description: After several exchanges of blows, Franky manages to defeat Sasaki.

title: Robin vs Black Maria
description: Robin fights Black Maria with Brook's help.

title: Demonio
description: Robin beats Black Maria.

title: Time for the headliners
description: Chavipère takes on Slurp, while Zoro and Sanji battle superstars King and Queen.

title: Like two drops of water
description: As the fighting progresses, Shinobu accedes to Momonosuké's request to age him by 20 years, transforming him into a gigantic dragon.

title: So-and-so
description: While fighting her father, Yamato remembers the samurai who helped her when Kaido imprisoned her at the age of 8.

title: Like a painting with two dragons
description: Momonosuke takes Luffy to the Onigashima dome so he can face Kaido again.

title: A decisive moment
description: While Luffy and Momonosuké battle Kaido, Caborage and Chavipère defeat Jack and Slurp respectively.

title: A peril beyond imagination
description: As Momonosuké tries to prevent Onigashima from reaching the flower capital, Zoro finds himself overwhelmed by King's power.

title: Brachioreptilaurus
description: Sanji's exoskeleton begins to awaken during his fight with Queen.

title: The tower
description: After finding his weak spot, Killer beats Hawkins.

title: Echoing the impermanence of things
description: While Orochi orders Kanjuro to destroy Onigashima by setting fire to the arsenal in the castle basement, Law and Kid reveal the awakened powers of their demon fruits and manage to injure Big Mom.

title: The science warrior
description: After some soul-searching, Sanji decides to destroy his Raid Suit rather than use it in his fight against Queen.

title: Oden's beloved sword
description: As the CP-0 members begin to fight Apoo and Drake, Zoro tries unsuccessfully to injure King and Orochi finds "Komurasaki" in the castle.

title: Kozaburo Shimotsuki
description: After recalling Kozaburo Shimotsuki from childhood memories, Zoro manages to master Enma by enveloping his blades in royal fluid.

title: Sanji vs Queen
description: Despite Queen's use of Germa 66 techniques, Sanji managed to defeat the latter using his "Ifrit Leg" technique.

title: Zoro vs King
description: After Zoro understands how King's body works, he manages to defeat the superstar.

title: The way of the samurai lies in death
description: While all the superstars have been defeated, Yamato continues to pursue the flaming monk, while Guernica and Maha defeat Zanki and Drake.

title: The intoxication of the divine dragon
description: Kaido goes into a state of distress and attacks Luffy. Meanwhile, as the Council of Five Elders discusses events in the land of Wa, Zunesh arrives near its shores.

title: Kidd and Law vs Big Mom
description: While Yamato battles the flaming monk, Izo prepares to fight Guernica and Maha. After being overwhelmed by Big Mom, Kidd and Law launch powerful attacks against her.

title: The last to shine
description: Kidd and Law use their last bit of strength to seriously injure Big Mom.

title: Vain as a threat to the new generation
description: After a final attack, Kidd and Law manage to defeat Big Mom.

title: Komurosaki
description: While Raizo emerges victorious from his battle with Fukurokuju, Komurasaki reveals his true identity to Orochi, and Izo, at the cost of his life, manages to defeat Maha. Meanwhile, Luffy attempts to defeat Kaido before his strength runs out.

title: Winners don't need epithets
description: Luffy and Kaido fight fiercely, but as they prepare their final attacks, Guernica distracts Luffy and Kaido delivers a devastating blow.

title: Let's die together!
description: After defeating Luffy, Kaido attacks the alliance, demanding that they hand over Momonosuké so that he can announce his surrender. However, as Zunesh declares that Joy Boy has returned, Luffy's body undergoes a transformation.

title: The liberating warrior
description: As the Council of Five Elders reveals the true identity of the Gum Gum fruit, Luffy names the awakening of his demon fruit "Gear 5" and resumes his battle with Kaido.

title: Next level
description: In his battle against Kaido, Luffy uses the Gear 5 to manipulate his environment like rubber and freely change the shape of his body.

title: Raizo
description: As Luffy and Kaido continue their battle and Onigashima begins to fall, Raizo, with Jinbe's help, activates his plan to extinguish the fire ravaging the island.

title: In the skies above the capital
description: As Onigashima arrives in the sky above the flower capital, Luffy and Kaido prepare to end their battle.

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: Twenty years
description: While Luffy and Kaido unleash their final attacks, Denjiro saves Hiyori and decapitates Orochi once and for all.

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: A world to build
description: Luffy manages to defeat Kaido and Momonosuké creates his own clouds of flames to land Onigashima safely.

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: Honor
description: As the alliance celebrates its victory over the Hundred Beasts crew, Hiyori and Denjiro prepare to present the new shogun of the land of Wa to the people.

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country
description: Momonosuké announces to the people of the Wa country that Kaido, Orochi and the crew of the hundred beasts have all been defeated, and proclaims himself the new shogun of the Wa country.

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: A new day
description: A week after the Raid, the crew of Chapeau de paille and the Kozuki clan take time out to relax, while the newspaper containing the new Emperors' bounties and names is published and Admiral Ryokugyu arrives in Wa land.

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: The new Emperors
description: As Ryokugyu goes into action in Wano, the festival begins and the newspaper reveals the new bonuses for Luffy, Law and Kidd, but also that Luffy, Baggy, Shanks and Blackbeard are now members of the "Four Emperors".

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: The Emperor of Flames
description: While the Red Furs, Yamato and Momonosuké battle Ryokugyu, the crew of Shanks the Red sails near Wa country and Sakazuki discusses recent events at a meeting, in particular Sabo's actions.

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: A new era
description: The samurai continue to fight Ryokugyu, but he flees the Wa country after Shanks unleashes a powerful wave of royal fluid against him from the coast.

tome.title: Momonosuké Kozuki, shogun of the Wa country

title: The futuristic island of Egg Head
Adventure in the land of science
Everything born into this world has been desired
The hero goes on the attack
L'équipage du Roux - an emperor's crew
Assassination attempt on a celestial dragon
Hostage taking
description: The inhabitants of Dawn Island worry about Garp's disappearance. A global earthquake triggered by the destruction of Lulusia causes chaos, floods and draws a huge Navy fleet led by Kizaru to Egghead. An intercepted call reveals York's agreement with the Straw Hat Pirates and the Ancients, leading to a tense situation involving Luffy and the others. The consequences of this earthquake are felt around the world, while Saturn and Doberman discuss the situation in Labophase and take drastic measures to prevent an escape.

title: Kuma the tyrant rampages through the Holy Land
Saint Jaygarcia Saturn of the Council of Five Deans, warrior god of science and defense
